items.summary: Store the resume PDF in the Motoko backend (stable state) and expose an HTTP download route that returns the PDF with appropriate headers so the browser downloads it as a file.
Seed the backend with the current resume PDF named "Hamza-Ali-Arshad-Resume-20251211-(1).pdf" so it is available immediately after deployment without manual upload steps.

Update the frontend "Download Resume" button to download the resume from the backend download route (instead of /assets/resume/Hamza-Ali-Arshad-Resume-20251211-(1).pdf), while keeping the existing disabled/loading behavior when the resume is unavailable.
